id,
username,
password,
nickname,

mapper.update:
update account_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
system_level = #{systemLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update account_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, system_level = #{systemLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from account_user where username=#{userName} and is_delete=0 limit 1

select
from account_user where is_delete=0
AND (username LIKE concat( '%',#{search},'%') OR nickname LIKE concat( '%',#{search},'%'))
